text: allāhu paṟayuṁ: niṅṅaḷkkumumpe kaḻiññupēāya jinnukaḷiluṁ manuṣyariluṁ peṭṭa samūhaṅṅaḷēāṭeāppaṁ niṅṅaḷuṁ narakattīyil pravēśikkuka. ōrēā saṅghavuṁ atil pravēśikkumpēāḷ taṅṅaḷuṭe mungāmikaḷāya saṅghatte śapiccukeāṇṭirikkuṁ. aṅṅane avareākkeyuṁ aviṭe orumiccukūṭiyāl avarile pingāmikaḷ taṅṅaḷuṭe mungāmikaḷekkuṟicc paṟayuṁ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā! ivarāṇ ñaṅṅaḷe vaḻi piḻappiccat. atināl ivarkku nī iraṭṭi narakaśikṣa nalkēṇamē.” allāhu aruḷuṁ: "ellāvarkkuṁ iraṭṭi śikṣayuṇṭ. pakṣē; niṅṅaḷaṟiyunnillennumātraṁ.”
